sub_title: Senior Monitoring Officer at OSCE Mission in Skopje
summary: Senior-level professional with over twenty years of experience in human rights, social development and good governance for the benefit of marginalized and disadvantaged groups, such as women, youth, religious and ethnic minorities, refugees; experienced on the management of teams and projects and the development of human resources, including the submission of grand proposals and raising of funds; expert on gender issues, especially on combating gender-based violence and counselling for women on career development (employment and entrepreneurship) and the development of gender-sensitive state policies. Established record in research, adult training on human rights, social integration and development and observation of elections.

•	Gender Expert – Trainer, Project Supervisor (3.2005 – 2.2006)  In cooperation with the Greek Ministry of Education, implemented training project for high school teachers and career counsellors on employment policies with the gender aspect; educated and informed trainees; supervised and coordinated the implementation of interventional programs in schools; organised workshops, provided briefings, drafted reports, conducted evaluation and follow up of projects; produced educational materials; organised campaign events.', 'title': 'Trainer and Project Manager / Gender Expert', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Greek Ministry of Internal Affairs, Research Centre for Gender Equality (KETHI)', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Thessaloniki, Greece', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}}, 'company': 'Greek Ministry of Internal Affairs, Research Centre for Gender Equality (KETHI)', 'description': '•	Gender Officer – Researcher, Career Counsellor

Planned, implemented and monitored projects for women’s advancement and integration in the labour market; organized capacity building trainings and career planning workshops; provided counselling to women on issues of social integration, career orientation and entrepreneurship; coordinated activities with the Ministry of Labour for the formation of employment strategies at national level for the enhancement of women; designed projects for combating gender based violence and trafficking of women; conducted research and provided documentation; produced educational materials and counselling tools; organized campaigns; sensitized and trained agencies, groups and individuals on gender issues. During the period 09.2003-03.2005 in cooperation with the Greek Ministry of Education implemented nation-wide project for training, educating and sensitizing public education teachers on gender rights and career orientation; supported the implementation of interventional programs in public schools; organised work-groups; drafted reports, conducted evaluation and follow up of the programme; drafted tools and educational materials; organised campaign events.', 'title': 'Gender Officer – Researcher, Career Counsellor', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': '“Herakleitus” Network (Municipalities - Prefecture of Thessaloniki - Greek Manpower Organization)', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 1997}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Thessaloniki, Greece', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 1997}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}}, 'company': '“Herakleitus” Network (Municipalities - Prefecture of Thessaloniki - Greek Manpower Organization)', 'description': '•	Career Counsellor (03.1997– 02.1999, 01.2000-09.2001)  

Supported persons facing social exclusion (women, youth, immigrants, asylum seekers, minorities and other socially excluded groups) in career planning and integration in the labour market; provided counselling, organised workshops on capacity building and career planning; developed and operated a pilot business-network program providing employment opportunities, and a data base system on employment services; produced counselling tools, drafted reports, conducted research and project evaluation; participated in work-groups and liaised with NGOs, governmental organizations and private institutions for the creation of a network of counselling centres; collected information on the local labour market and services provided by other organizations.', 'title': 'Career Counsellor', 'employment_type': None}]}]
